\[ \text{Tip} = 0.20 \times 180 = 36 \]

So, the total amount paid is the bill plus the tip:

\[ \text{Total paid} = 180 + 36 = 216 \]

Now, this total amount of $216 was split evenly among the friends, and each person paid $48. To find out how many friends there were, I can divide the total amount by the amount each person paid:

\[ \text{Number of friends} = \frac{216}{48} \]

\[ 216 \div 48 = 4.5 \]
